How to Play:

You can move LEFT ( A ), RIGHT ( D ) and JUMP ( spacebar ).

During the game you can collect rings to get points, hearts to get back lives and shields to get invulnerability for some time.

Eggman- your enemy! - is coming for you, you will be warned about him with a red pyramid which moves along his trajectory so that you can avoid him even when he's behind you.

You loose life when you hit an obstacle or when Eggman hits you. After you've been hit you're invulnerable for some seconds, use that time to escape from every danger!

In the upper left corner you can see your score, in the upper right corner you can see your lives. When you loose one or more lives, the corresponding number of hearts turn gray

Select the difficulty of your game. An easy game allows you to get hit four times before a game over; the extreme game gives you only one shot.

Easy       Medium       Hard       Extreme
